titleStmt.title: A perspicuous compendium of several irregularities and abuses in the present practice of the common laws of England· With several queries and proposals thereupon for regulation of laws, without the help of the legislative power, or new law made. By D.W. of the Mtddle-Temple [sic], barrister.
titleStmt.author: D. W.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Lock for Hen. Flesher, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the thrre [sic] Cups in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
